trends: There has been one other sighting in Pilot Hill
There were no other sightings in Pilot Hill on or around September 25th 2009
Summary: 3 Silver / White orbs connected together in triangle shape hovering in the sky and then zipped away
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back to my home at 2:58pm, after I had picked my son up from the bus stop. At the top of the hill getting ready to turn onto our street I stopped my vehicle as I saw the object hovering in the air. The object was hovering in the air above the vineyard valley below, I sat watching the object hover and noticing the structure and trying to determine what it was. I was connected with sticks, strings or a structure forming a triangle. I saw the object and my son accompanying me in the truck saw it as well and he saw it streak across the sky.
